root.name: Chou Majin Eiyuuden: Wataru Mazekko Monster
root.description: OverviewChou Majin Eiyuuden: Wataru Mazekko Monster was developed by Alpha-Unit and published by Banpresto for the Game Boy.The goal in Chou Majin Eiyuuden is to hatch a creature from an egg and raise it. More creatures can also be obtained. Chou Majin Eiyuuden: Wataru Mazekko Monster is based off of an anime series called Chou Majin Eiyuuden Wataru
